translation: In the destruction of a family, the immemorial religious rites of that family perish; on the destruction of spirituality, impiety indeed, overwhelms the whole family.
commentary: 1.40 Kulakshaya in the destruction of a family? perish perish? Family religious rites? Sanatanah immemorial? Spirituality in religion? lost being destroyed? Kulam kritsnam the whole family? Adharma: impiety? overcomes overcomes? Ut indeed.Commentary Dharma -- the duties and ceremonies practiced by the family in accordance with the injunctions of the scriptures.
